definitions.body: Ham, 2nd son of Noah Ge 5:32, Ge 6:10, Ge 7:13, Ge 9:18, Ge 9:18, 1Ch 1:4; called father of Canaan Ge 9:22 and of various peoples Ge 10:1, Ge 10:6, Ge 10:20, 1Ch 1:8, cf. [[מִן־חָם הַיּשְׁבִים שָׁם]] 1Ch 4:40; these peoples were inhabitants of southern lands, or related historically or politically to such inhabitants; v. [[כּוּשׁ]], [[כְּנַעַן]], [[מִחְרַיִם]], [[פּוּט]], etc.
